layout.singingstanza: Lord, I still love You, Though it seems, some -- times, hard to do. So man -- y things, in all my life I do not un -- der -- stand. Oh my Lord, I need You. I love You.

lyrics.stanza: Lord, I still love You, Though it seems, sometimes, hard to do. So many things, in all my life I do not understand. Oh my Lord, I need You. I love You.
Lord, the church—Your Bride, You've included me—qualified! So, in the whole wide world, My city, home, and heart—Spread dear Lord, House to house, for whom You've died.
